thread.title: Michael & Nancy Bamforth
thread.title_full: TrustedHousesitters reviewed by Michael & Nancy Bamforth

author: Michael & Nancy Bamforth
title: Michael & Nancy Bamforth
text: We used to feel guilty and reticent about leaving our dog for any period of time. But now, thanks to TrustedHousesitters, we have found the perfect win-win solution that allows us to go places. The housesitters are happy to stay in our beautiful home, and our adorable cocker spaniel gets 100% devoted attenttion. So we can enjoy our time away in complete serenity. Plus we have met some truly wonderful people from differnent parts of the world.. We have had 3 very positive experiences to date and look forward to using the Housesitters in the future.
